All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddPlayerToGameMessage
Represents a message from the client to add a player to a game.
BackgroundImageSetter
A JPanel subclass used to display a background image.
Board
Board class represents the game board.
BoardTest
 
BoardView
Represents the view of the game board where cards are inserted into cells.
BoardViewGUITest
 
BoardViewTest
 
CardManager
Interface for managing various card-related functionalities and storing image paths in the game GUI.
CardType
Enum representing the types of playable cards in the game.
Cell
Cell class represents a cell on the board containing a playable card.
ChatMessage
Represents a chat message containing information about the sender and the content of the message.
CheckForExistingGameMessage
Represents a message from the client to check for an existing game.
ChoosePrivateObjectiveCardMessage
Represents a message from the client to choose a private objective card.
ClientApp
 
ClientConnectionTimer
Manages a timer for monitoring client-server connection status.
ClientDispatcher
ClientDispatcher class that manages messages received from the server and delegates them to the associated View.
ClientInterface
Class that represent the client on the server.
ConnectionBuilder
 
Controller
Class that represents the controller which is responsible to call the correct game phase class to perform the action request by the players
ControllerDispatcher
Class that receives all messages from ServerDispatcher and it forwards them to the Controller
ControllerTest
 
Coordinates
Coordinates class represents a set of coordinates in a 2-dimensional space where the card has been placed.
CoordinatesTest
 
CreateNewGameMessage
Represents a message from the client to create a new game.
CustomComboBoxRenderer
Custom renderer for rendering JLabels in a JComboBox.
DealingPhase
Game phase responsible to deal cards and objective cards to players
DealingPhaseTest
 
Deck
Deck class represents a collection of different card decks used in the game.
DeckTest
 
DiskManager
Class that represents a disk manager.
DiskManagerTest
 
DragScrollListener
A mouse listener and mouse motion listener that enables dragging to scroll functionality for a JScrollPane.
DrawCardFromDeckMessage
Represents a message from the client to draw a card from the deck.
EndPhase
Game phase responsible to calculate the winner
FrameManager
The FrameManager class extends JFrame and implements View.
Game
The Game class represents the core model for a game instance; it's created for each game and has reference to each part of the model.
GamePhase
Interface representing the various phases and actions that can be performed during a game.
GameState
Enum representing the different states of the game.
GameTest
 
GenericException
Custom exception class for handling generic exceptions in the application.
Getter
The Getter interface defines a method for retrieving the URL of a resource based on its name.
GoldCardGetter
The GoldCardGetter class implements the Getter interface and provides a method to retrieve a resource URL based on the resource name.
ImageIconRenderer
Custom TableCellRenderer for displaying ImageIcon in a JTable cell.
ImageIconTableModel<K,V>
ImageIconTableModel is a custom table model for displaying images and values in a JTable.
JoiningPhase
Game phase responsible to add players to the desired game
JoiningPhaseTest
 
LobbyController
The LobbyController class manages the state of games and players in the lobby system.
LobbyControllerTest
 
LoginFrame
Represents the graphical user interface for the login and lobby creation process.
MainPage
Represents the main graphical user interface (GUI) page for the game "Codex Naturalis".
MainPage.CardData
A record that encapsulates a JLabel and a corresponding JCheckBox.
MessagesFromClient
Interface representing messages sent from the client to the server.
MessagesFromServer
 
MidPhase
Game phase responsible to execute placeCard and drawCard
MidPhaseTest
 
NewMessage
Represents a new chat message sent from a client.
ObjectiveAchieved
used to track for each player which are the objective cards that gave him points and the amount
ObjectiveCard
Abstract class representing an objective card in the game.
ObjectiveCardGetter
The ObjectiveCardGetter class implements the Getter interface and provides a method to retrieve a resource URL based on the resource name.
ObjectiveCardTest
 
ObjectObjective
Represents an objective card based on a specific set of resources (objects).
ObjectObjectiveTest
 
Observer
The Observer class manages client listeners and notifies them with messages from the server.

Represents a pattern objective card that awards points based on specific patterns formed on the game board.

Represents a message from a client to place a card on the game board.

Represents a message from a client to place the starting card on the game board.

Represents a playable card in the game.
PlayableCardTest
 
Player
Player class represents a player in a game
PlayerTest
 
PointsCondition
Enum representing different points conditions for the golden cards.
PongMessage
Represents a PONG message sent from a client to respond to a PING message from the server.
Position
Enum representing positions in a game.
Printer
class Printer is used to print messages from TUI.
PrinterTest
 
Reader
A thread-based reader that reads input from the console.
ReconnectPlayerToGameMessage
Represents a message from a client requesting to reconnect a player to a game.
ReignObjective
Represents a reign objective card that specifies points based on the number of times a specific reign resource has been collected.
ReignObjectiveTest
 
Resource
Enum representing different types of resources in the game.
ResourceCardGetter
The ResourceCardGetter class implements the Getter interface and provides a method to retrieve a resource URL based on the resource name.
ResourceGetter
 
RMIConnectionAdapter
RMIConnectionAdapter represents an RMI (Remote Method Invocation) adapter that implements both ServerInterface and ClientInterface.
RMIServer
 
RMIServerInterface
RMIServerInterface represents the interface that defines methods callable remotely by RMI clients.
ServerApp
 
ServerConnectionTimer
Manages a timer for server-client connection validation.
ServerDispatcher
Class that represents ServerDispatcher which receives all messages from the SocketClient and send them to the ControllerDispatcher
ServerDispatcherInterface
Interface for dispatching messages received from clients to the controller dispatcher.
ServerImpulse
Runnable task representing a server impulse to periodically send ping messages to a client.
ServerInterface
Class that represent the server on the client.
SetupPhase
Game phase responsible to deal all players the starter card
SetupPhaseTest
 
SocketAccepter
 
SocketClient
Class that represents the "virtual client" for the server calls the methods of this class the class then creates the messages and sends them to the client where they'll be elaborated
SocketServer
Class that represents the "virtual server" for the client
StartCard
Represents the starter card in the game, extending PlayableCard.
StartCardTest
 
StarterCardGetter
The StarterCardGetter class implements the Getter interface and provides a method to retrieve a resource URL based on the resource name.
Table
Table class represents the game table, storing available cards and player scores.
TableTest
 
TokenChoiceMessage
Represents a message from a client indicating a choice of token color.
TokenColor
Enum representing different colors of playable tokens.
TokenManager
The TokenManager class is responsible for managing the tokens on a scoreboard.
TUI
The TUI class implements View.
TUITest
 
View
 
WaitingLobby
The WaitingLobby interface represents a lobby where players wait before starting a game.
WinningFrame
The WinningFrame class represents a graphical window that displays the winner and the ranking of players at the end of the game.
